description: Try our easy to follow Beetroot Pate recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Veggie dip,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Beetroot
name: Beetroot Pate Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, 2tsp of lemon juiced, rind finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Heat coconut oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes or until soft. Add garlic, beetroot and spices and cook, stirring regularly, for a further 810 minutes or until beetroot is soft.
Cool slightly then transfer to a food processor. Add cashews, 1/2 tsp salt, lemon juice and rind, and process for 23 minutes, scraping down sides of food processor, until smooth.
Spoon pâté into a serving dish. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 34 hours or until firm. Serve with crackers and crudités.
